translation: It is the seat of all living beings, because it does not cling to anything.

source_sentence: 雖復利樂諸世間　　常觀空性而寂然
translation: He may follow the ways of all living beings, yet he always observes emptiness.

source_sentence: 若不利樂諸眾生　　有所著因墮地獄
translation: If you do not benefit sentient beings, fall into hell because of your attachment to them.

source_sentence: 所有十方世界中　　現住一切諸如來
